text: Elise Fischer or Élise Fischer (13 July 1948 – 25 December 2023) was a French writer, journalist and novelist from Lorraine. She died on 25 December 2023, at the age of 75. ==Gallery== File:Elise_Fischer-FIG_2000.jpg|link=|Elise Fischer in year 2000. File:Elise Fischer - Livre sur la Place 2014 (15031166357).jpg|link=|Elise Fischer in year 2014. title: Elise Fischer
